nodes.text: Crystalmead was a type of mead served at Klang's Place, a cheap bar in Canto Bight. Kedpin Shoklop and Anglang Lehet had some while spending time at the bar. Unbeknownst to Kedpin, Angland slipped a tiny, ingestible, remote-operated nano-detonator into his drink, intending to turn the little Wermal into a living bomb.
